MobiLe You Everywhere
in Your Town

Discover how to travel Fast, Safe and Green!

Problems we solve

01

Parking Lots

Lack of special zones for parking and deposit them while charging.

02

Green Energy

The E-scooters are not so green because the energy used for charging them is not always green.

03

Vandalsim & Theft

E-scooters can be stolen or damaged.

04

Battery

Battery life and recharging system is poor.

05

Management

Maintenance and management of the E-scooters.

06

Safety

E-scooter can be dangerous if you do not have enough experience.

Solutions

01

Definition of 3 zones: red, yellow and green. Red means out of the area that is charged with a progressive payment. Yellow it's a safe place but can not recharge. Green zone it's recharging zone.

02

Every charging station is designed with a solar charging panel.

03

The renting time ends at a certain time and every e-scooter has a unique identifier.

04

The E-scooters recharge from the braking system.

05

Managers can see the the tim zones and ares where the scooters are ussualy booked.

06

Every user have a star rating in relation with his experience(time spent on a scooter or kilometers).

What riders are saying

Jamie, 21

Life Saver for My Commute! This app is a game-changer for quick city travel. It's easy to use and eco-friendly. More parking areas would be a plus.

Henry, 34

Great for short trips but needs better safety reminders. GPS tracking is handy. Addressing safety issues is essential, especially with riders ignoring traffic rules.

Marcus, 69

Best Way to Explore the City! Clean interface, easy to use, and fantastic for urban exploration. Remember to ride responsibly and park thoughtfully.
